pages.text: $(item)Tea$() is a Food item cooked in the $(pot)Advanced Crock Pot$(). It requires at least either two $(item)Fern$() or one $(item)Large Fern$() and 1 $(thing)Sweetener$(), and excluding $(thing)Meats$(), $(thing)Vegetables$(), $(thing)Inedibles$(), and $(thing)Frozen$(). It takes 10 seconds to cook.
